message: Starting investigation of agent failure patterns - searching codebase for logs, error handling, and TODO/FIXME notes
Found basic error handling patterns. Now searching for agent accountability mechanisms, validation patterns, and signs of incomplete work
Found DEAD CODE: wrapper function exists but is never called. Agents run without progress enforcement. Investigating more patterns
Confirmed dead code. Now analyzing historical context and checking for other missing accountability mechanisms
Completing final analysis and preparing comprehensive summary of all failure patterns discovered

Investigation complete. Discovered 4 critical findings: 1) Dead code - wrapper function exists but unused, 2) Zero validation - agents trusted blindly, 3) Superficial quality mentions - no enforcement, 4) Trust without verification throughout system. All findings reported with evidence and recommendations.
